title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Strengthening Entrepreneurial Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational entrepreneurship theory and business model comprehension
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-enabled environments, emphasizing practical entrepreneurial problem-solving skills via activity-based pedagogy. Integrates with the mathematics domain to concurrently develop data analysis and financial planning abilities.

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose five core entrepreneurial competencies (self-efficacy, opportunity recognition, problem-solving, leadership, and financial management).
Learners can analyze social issues using mathematical approaches and propose viable business models.
Learners can complete microlearning content with an 80%+ completion rate in mobile environments and perform practical assignments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
